heroes.name: Superman (Clark Kent/Kal-El)
heroes.powers: flight, super strength, super speed, enhanced senses, enhanced durability
heroes.quote: There is a right and a wrong in this universe. And that distinction is not hard to make.

heroes.name: Batman (Bruce Wayne)
heroes.powers: peak human strength and agility, genius level intellect, immense wealth
heroes.quote: I am the vengeance, I am the night, I am Batman!

heroes.name: Wonder Woman (Diana Prince)
heroes.powers: super strength, super speed, superior combat skills
heroes.weapons: lasso of truth, bullet proof gauntlets, sword, shield
heroes.quote: I Will Fight For Those Who Cannot Fight For Themselves.

heroes.name: The Flash (Barry Allen)
heroes.powers: abilty to move, think, and react at or beyond the speed of light
heroes.quote: I've spent my whole life searching for the impossible, never imagining that I would become the impossible

heroes.name: Aquaman (Arthur Curry)
heroes.powers: super strength, enhanced durabilty, ability to swim at hypersonic speed, abiltity to communicate with all marine life
heroes.quote: Okay, so we're doing things a little out of order. S*** happens.

heroes.name: Cyborg (Victor Stone)
heroes.powers: flight, super strength, super speed, technopathy, enhanced durability
heroes.weapons: cybernetic prosthesis which can form weapons
heroes.quote: You Want Me To Use These Gifts, Right? That's What I'll Do.

heroes.name: Martian Manhunter (J'Onn J'Onzz)
heroes.powers: flight, super strength, super speed, telpathy, shapeshifting, phasing
heroes.quote: I will defend Earth!

heroes.name: Iron Man (Tony Stark)
heroes.powers: peak human intellengence and ingenuity, wealth
heroes.weapons: Exosuit which grants flight, strength, and repulsor weapons
heroes.quote: I'm Iron Man

heroes.name: Captain America (Steve Rogers)
heroes.powers: peak human strength and combat skill, master tactitian
heroes.quote: I can do this all day

heroes.name: Hulk (Bruce Banner)
heroes.powers: enhanced strength which increases the madder he gets
heroes.quote: Don't make me angry. You wouldn't like me when I'm angry...Hulk Smash

heroes.name: Thor (Thor Odinson)
heroes.powers: super strength, super speed, superior combat skills
heroes.quote: I went for the head

heroes.name: Black Panther (T'Challa)
heroes.powers: super strength, super speed, superior combat skills
heroes.weapons: Vibranium cat suit with retractable claws
heroes.quote: Wakanda Forever

heroes.name: Spiderman (Peter Parker)
heroes.powers: super strength, super agility, spider sense, wall climbing
heroes.quote: With great power, comes great responsibility

heroes.name: Doctor Strange (Stephen Strange MD/PhD)
heroes.powers: master of the mystic arts
heroes.weapons: cloak of levitation, bands of Cyttorak, magical constructs
heroes.quote: They Really Should Put The Warnings Before This Spell.

heroes.name: Captain Marvel (Carol Danvers)
heroes.powers: flight, super strength, super speed, enhanced durability
heroes.quote: Higher, further, faster, baby.

heroes.name: Wolverine (Logan/James Howlett)
heroes.powers: healing factor, adamatium covered skeleton
heroes.quote: I'm The Best There Is At What I Do But What I Do Best Isn't Very Nice.

heroes.name: Marvel Girl (Jean Grey)
heroes.powers: telepathy, telekinesis
heroes.quote: I Know What Everybody Feels.

heroes.name: Cyclops (Scott Summers)
heroes.powers: optic blasts
heroes.quote: That's why I am a leader. The blind leading the blind, maybe... but a leader nonetheless.

heroes.name: Professor X (Charles Xavier)
heroes.powers: telepathy
heroes.quote: Just because someone stumbles and loses their path, doesn’t mean they’re lost forever.

heroes.name: Storm (Ororo Monroe)
heroes.powers: weather manipulation
heroes.quote: Are you ready to do what you need to do when the time comes?

heroes.name: Mystique (Raven Darkholme)
heroes.powers: shapeshifting
heroes.quote: I have work to do… after a quick change!

heroes.name: Neo
heroes.powers: in the matrix has super strength, speed,; outside matrix has technopathy
heroes.quote: I know kung fu

heroes.name: Gambit (Remy LeBeau)
heroes.powers: ability to charge objects with explosive energy
heroes.weapons: anything in his hand is a weapon
heroes.quote: Engarde

heroes.name: Goku (Son Goku)
heroes.powers: super strength, superspeed, martial arts
heroes.quote: I will not let you destroy my world!

heroes.name: War Machine (James Rhodes)
heroes.powers: exosuit which grants flight and super strength
heroes.quote: This lone gunslinger act is unecessary

heroes.name: Vision
heroes.powers: super strength, speed, flight, phasing
heroes.quote: Humans are odd. They think order and chaos are somehow opposites and... try to control what won't be. But there is grace in their failings.
